description:
This pack features 5 costumes and 2 accessories that can be used in NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.

Included Costumes:
• Minato Namikaze (Genin Costume)
• Kushina Uzumaki (Genin Costume)
• Sakura Haruno (The Perfect Day for a Wedding)
• Ino Yamanaka (The Perfect Day for a Wedding)
• Tenten (The Perfect Day for a Wedding)

Included Accessories:
• Hidan's Sickle
• Sword of Nunoboko
name: NBUNSC - Costume & Accessory Pack
